info.thermal.energy_limiter_attachment.0: [待翻译] Limits the amount of energy flowing through it.
info.thermal.energy_limiter_attachment.1: [待翻译] Can be configured to allow different amounts in each direction.
info.thermal.energy_limiter_attachment.2: [待翻译] Hold §e§oShift§r and/or §e§oCtrl§r to fine tune amounts.
info.thermal.fluid_filter_attachment.0: [待翻译] Place items containing fluid in slots to add the fluid to the filter list.
info.thermal.fluid_filter_attachment.1: [待翻译] Additional options can be used to fine-tune filtering.
info.thermal.fluid_filter_attachment.2: [待翻译] Redstone Control can be used to temporarily disable filtering.
info.thermal.fluid_servo_attachment.0: [待翻译] Place items containing fluid in slots to add the fluid to the filter list.
info.thermal.fluid_servo_attachment.1: [待翻译] Additional options can be used to fine-tune filtering.
info.thermal.fluid_servo_attachment.2: [待翻译] Redstone Control is used to enable extraction.
info.thermal.fluid_turbo_servo_attachmen: [待翻译] A much faster Servo, with limited filtering.
[待翻译] Place items containing fluid in the filter slot.
[待翻译] Additional options can be used to fine-tune filtering and extraction amount.
[待翻译] Redstone Control is used to enable extraction.
info.thermal.item_buffer.0: [待翻译] Restricts quantity and flow of items.
info.thermal.item_buffer.1: [待翻译] Set desired items and quantities using the left grid.
info.thermal.item_buffer.2: [待翻译] Mouse wheel can be used to fine-tune item quantity.
info.thermal.item_buffer.3: [待翻译] Latch I/O requires all items to be present before extraction is allowed.
info.thermal.item_buffer.4: [待翻译] Very useful for maintaining specific item ratios.
